name: GoIIT.com - JEE Preparation & Mock Test Platform
overview:
GoIIT.com is a wonderfull concept. It is a one of a kind portal that is a home for tons of experts in the field of engineering entrance preparation. From top 100 rankers in the coveted IIT-JEE examination to renowned coaching centre teachers, all can be found here goIIT.com. Not only this, these brilliant people are more than eager to help out budding students. Students preparing for IIT engineering exams are free to ask & discuss their questions in which they face difficulty. These questions are answered within a short period of time either by the experts or by other students who got the answer.

Apart from this, online entrance forum goIIT.com also houses a great deal of entrance exam information as well as course material on various topics in Physics, Chemistry & mathematics. This course material is very well prepared, it’s concise and is amply supported by solid examples.

ounded in 2006, GoIIT.com, a pioneer online education platform in education industry, comprises of IIT alumni, top coaching institutes & engineering graduates.

For more: http://www.goiit.com/
